mapper.select: select DISTINCT mt.theater_no, ms.schedule_date from MGV_THEATERS mt, MGV_THEATER_SCREEN mts , MGV_SCHEDULE ms WHERE mt.THEATER_NO = #{theaterNo} and mt.THEATER_NO = mts.THEATER_NO and mts.SCREEN_ID = ms.SCREEN_ID
select A.movie_no as movieNo, B.theater_no as theaterNo from (select MOVIE_NO, SCREEN_ID from MGV_SCHEDULE where schedule_date = #{value}) A, MGV_THEATER_SCREEN B where A.SCREEN_ID = B.SCREEN_ID

select C.MOVIE_NO as movieNo, C.SCREEN_ID as screenId, c.SCREEN_NAME as screenName, c.theater_no as theaterNo, D.theater_name as theaterName, c.SCHEDULE_START_TIME as startTime, c.SCHEDULE_END_TIME as endTime, c.SCHEDULE_TURN as turn, c.REMAINING_SEATS as remainingSeats, c.SCREEN_SEATS as screenSeats from(select A.*, B.theater_no,B.SCREEN_NAME from (select MOVIE_NO, SCREEN_ID, SCHEDULE_START_TIME,SCHEDULE_END_TIME, SCHEDULE_TURN,REMAINING_SEATS,SCREEN_SEATS from MGV_SCHEDULE where schedule_date =#{date} and SCHEDULE_START_TIME > #{time}) A, MGV_THEATER_SCREEN B where A.SCREEN_ID = B.SCREEN_ID and theater_no =#{theaterNo} and Movie_no =#{movieNo}) C, MGV_THEATERS D where C.THEATER_NO=D.THEATER_NO order by turn asc
